# Comman commands


```sql

--- This is a comment, note that it starts with three dashes

delete from states where type IN ('MME','SGW','S1AP','directory_record','mobilityd_ipdesc_record','subscriber_state');
select * from states where type IN ('MME','SGW','S1AP','directory_record','mobilityd_ipdesc_record','subscriber_state');

update cfg_network_configs set value='\x7b22656e61626c655f63616368696e67223a66616c73652c226c6f63616c5f74746c223a307d' where network_id='gxcdirect_01434' and type='dnsd_network';

insert into states(network_id, type, key, value) values('testnetwork2','mobilityd_ipdesc_record','IMSI123456789012003.MeshBackhaul,ipv4','\');

```

# postgres specific


```sh

pg_dump --host ${host} -U ${user} -d ${dbname} -p ${port}

psql --host ${host} -U ${user} -d ${dbname} -p ${port}

```
